What country is ð¬ð¶?

People often ask which country uses ð¬ð¶ emoji flag. The answer is Equatorial Guinea . Equatorial Guinea is located in Middle Africa continent. The country area is 28051 km2, and the capital city is Malabo ( 3.75 , 8.78333 ). Some of the neighboring countries are Cameroon, Gabon , and the country is not landlocked. Some of the timezones in Equatorial Guinea are UTC+01:00 . The currency used in Equatorial Guinea is Central African CFA franc ( XAF ). People in Equatorial Guinea speak mostly Spanish, French, Portuguese, Fang . Equatorial Guinea is part of the Middle Africa region.
